PHRASE.LANG: "She draped herself across the seat by his desk. How could he refuse her?" [#Legal]
« Elle se colla au fauteuil de son bureau. Comment pouvait-il la rejeter ? » [#Legal]
"Sie setzte sich auf den Stuhl an seinem Schreibtisch. Wie könnte er sie zurückweisen?" [#Legal]
"Si appoggiò sulla sedia accanto alla sua scrivania. Come poteva dirle di no?" [#Legal]
"Sentada en la silla junto a su escritorio pensaba en cómo seducirle". [#Legal]
「色気を漂わせるのに最適な椅子。」 [#Legal]
"She draped herself across the seat by his desk. How could he refuse her?" [#Legal]
"She draped herself across the seat by his desk. How could he refuse her?" [#Legal]
